title: Ukraine war: Russia says it will curb Kyiv assault as peace talks progress
content:
1. Ukraine war: Russia says it will curb Kyiv assault as peace talks progress  BBC.com
  2. Russia announces it will 'drastically reduce military activity' in two key Ukrainian cities  CNN
  3. Russia repositions troops away from Kyiv, marking a shift in the war  CNBC
  4. Russia says it has 'drastically' reduced military activity near Kyiv; Biden, Pentagon skeptical: Live Ukraine updates  USA TODAY
  5. Zelensky Says to Not Trust Russian Promises: 'We Are Not Naive People'  Newsweek
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
